system.description:
This School of magic concerns itself with plants and plant products, including wood, rope, cloth, and paper. Spells are usually cast in the form of both spoken incantations and arcane gestures.

Spontaneous Casting Complexities

ComplexityEffect
0

Learn the properties of a plant; promote the healthy growth of plants

1

Grow plants rapidly or alter their shape

2

Create plants or plant materials

3

Control plants or plant products
